heading: Today
text: Mostly cloudy north, with localized, passing snow showers, and some breaks of sun.  Periods of sunshine south, sunniest in southern valleys, with a stray afternoon snow shower.  Highs in the low to mid 30s north, near 40 south.  Northwest winds 5 to 15 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Any snow showers ending.  Clearing south, and becoming partly cloudy in northern valleys, clouds lingering near the mountains.  Lows in the upper teens to mid 20s.  Winds diminishing to light and variable.

heading: Saturday
text: Early clouds north give way to sun, and morning sunshine south. Increasing afternoon clouds west to east.  Highs from the low 30s to low 40s north to south.  Light winds, becoming south up to 10 mph in the afternoon.
